events.name: Blood Libel: Satanic Panic, QAnon, and Anti-Semitism
events.description: Evan Anderson presents the anti-Semitic roots of Satanic Panic and QAnon.

events.name: Ted Gunderson and The Finders
events.description: Lenny Flatley discusses Ted Gunderson and the Finders and the long, strange trip from the Satanic Panic to QAnon.

events.name: Salem Cemeteries
events.description: Thomas Valor discusses graveyard history and gravestone symbolism from early new England and how it relates to the occult.

events.name: La Bete of Satan
events.description: An early satanic panic based around the Beast of Guevudan Lecture and Q&A with Zee Kay.

events.name: Pumpkin Soup
events.description: Learn how to cook a really awesome seasonal pumpkin soup as The Satanic Chef takes you through the steps to make this at home.

events.name: Bats in the Belfry
events.description: Meet your new best friend, a fruit bat or insect bat from BatWorld, a shelter in Texas that cares for these sweethearts. Learn more about their work at batworld.org

events.name: Library
events.description: The Satanic Panic Archive Library is open all night. Many of these texts exist nowhere else in the world.

events.name: DJ Mercy
events.description: Mercy spins Heresy and Blasphemy from TST Salem, MA

events.name: Infernal Goat Nursery
events.description: Sponsor one of these good kids at woodstocksanctuary.org

events.name: the incorporeal estate
events.description: Disappear into the night with DJ incrprl, spinning a mysterious and haunting mix of cold wave, witch house, EBM, industrial bass, and other dark electronic sounds. In the liminal space of the incorporeal estate, let the bewitching melodies entrance you to dance until you drop.

events.name: Down the Rabbit Hole
events.description: Meet Winston and Winona, Ada's beloved rabbits!
